channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Spectrum LSF
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Spectrum LSF

item.title: CVE-2020-4278|2024-08-04T08:00:06.937Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20lsf
item.description: IBM Platform LSF 9.1 and 10.1, IBM Spectrum LSF Suite 10.2, and IBM Spectrum Suite for HPA 10.2 could allow a local user to escalate their privileges due to weak file permissions when specific debug settings are enabled in a Linux or Unix enviornment. IBM X-Force ID: 176137.
